content:
You're welcome! It was great chatting with you too. I'm glad I could help with your shoe-related queries.

It's actually quite impressive that you have a good memory for specific dates and events. It can definitely come in handy in many situations!

Good luck with cleaning your Converse, and I hope you find the perfect Gel-Kayano sneakers on the ASICS website. If you have any more questions or need any further assistance, feel free to ask!

Have a great day, and happy shoe shopping!
